00038 #ifndef _PLT_HTTP_SERVER_H_
00039 #define _PLT_HTTP_SERVER_H_
00040 
00041 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 |   includes
00043 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00044 #include "Neptune.h"
00045 #include "PltHttpServerTask.h"
00046 
00047 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 |   PLT_HttpServer class
00049 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00054 class PLT_HttpServer : public NPT_HttpRequestHandler,
00055                        public NPT_HttpServer
00056 {
00057 public:
00058     PLT_HttpServer(NPT_IpAddress address = NPT_IpAddress::Any,
00059                    unsigned int  port = 0,
00060                    bool          allow_random_port_on_bind_failure = false,
00061                    NPT_Cardinal  max_clients = 0,
00062                    bool          reuse_address = false);
00063     virtual ~PLT_HttpServer();
00064     
00065     // class methods
00066     static NPT_Result ServeFile(const NPT_HttpRequest& request,
00067                                 NPT_HttpResponse&      response, 
00068                                 NPT_String             file_path);
00069     static const char* GetMimeType(const NPT_String& filename);
00070     
00071     // NPT_HttpRequestHandler methods
00077     virtual NPT_Result AddRequestHandler(NPT_HttpRequestHandler* handler, 
00078                                          const char*             path, 
00079                                          bool                    include_children = false);
00080     virtual NPT_Result SetupResponse(NPT_HttpRequest&              request,
00081                                      const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00082                                      NPT_HttpResponse&             response);
00083 
00084     // methods
00085     virtual NPT_Result   Start();
00086     virtual NPT_Result   Stop();
00087     virtual unsigned int GetPort() { return m_Port; }
00088 
00089 private:
00090     PLT_TaskManager*                  m_TaskManager;
00091     NPT_IpAddress                     m_Address;
00092     unsigned int                      m_Port;
00093     bool                              m_AllowRandomPortOnBindFailure;
00094     bool                              m_ReuseAddress;
00095     PLT_HttpListenTask*               m_HttpListenTask;
00096     NPT_List<NPT_HttpRequestHandler*> m_RequestHandlers;
00097 };
